name: Bouncing Village
description:
Bouncing Village, an afresh new bouncing ball game, is free to play! To get a high score and stars just need to tap the screen.
High score always comes with skills, the more skilled you are, the higher the scores. And ball skins can be obtained for several!

There are various stage goals and interesting bouncing ball skills designed to make the game more fun. And also, there are fine ball skins that can be unlocked and collected.

· Tap the screen to drop the ball. Try to fall through the stone groove to win prize.
·Reach the goal to complete the stage, the higher the scores, the more the stars.
·Collect fruits to exchange fine skins.

Download and start the game to see which place you can get!
